author: taylor
msg: example of using portlet in a decorator

author: taylor
msg: Portlets are usually aggregated from the PSML file.
This feature will allow you to place portlets in the decorator templates as well.
The trick here is to get user preferences to work with it, since the portlet will not be associated with a page.

author: gbayon
msg: - Updated 2003 solution for last Cosmetic changes
